Module es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.tppstopwordfiltering
Package es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.tppstopwordfiltering

Class TppStopwordFilteringProcessingStep

java.lang.Object
es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.AbstractProcessingStep
es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.abstracttppstep.AbstractTppProcessingStep
es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.tppstopwordfiltering.TppStopwordFilteringProcessingStep
All Implemented Interfaces:
es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.internal.ProcessingStepInterface
final class TppStopwordFilteringProcessingStep
extends AbstractTppProcessingStep
Removes stopwords from documents, using Text Processing Python.

In the reference implementation of Text Processing Python, this step normalizes multiple spaces to a single space, and uses NLTK stopword lists.

Example declaration for this step in a process definition file: 

 <step action="TppStopwordFiltering">
 	<parameters>
 		<tpp:endpoint>http://127.0.0.1:5005/tpp/v1/remove-stopwords</tpp:endpoint>
 		<textDocumentWithTitleTableName>tokenized_submission</textDocumentWithTitleTableName>
 		<textDocumentTableName>tokenized_comment</textDocumentTableName>
 		<tppsf:language>english</tppsf:language>
	</parameters>
 </step>
Author:
Alejandro González García
